title: Who are some famous guitarists who play or played on a Gibson Les Paul guitar? - Quora

response.answer_text: Les PaulSlash (Guns ’n’ Roses / Velvet Revolver)Jimmy Page (Led Zeppelin/Yardbirds)Zakk Wylde (Black Label Society/Pride & Glory/Ozzy Osbourne)Kirk Hammet (Metallica) who owned a guitar previously owned by…Gary Moore (Thin Lizzy/Collosseum II/Gary Moore), who bought the same guitar from…Peter Green (Peter Green’s Fleetwood Mac)Ace Frehly (KISS, Frehly’s Comet)Joe Perry (Aerosmith)Billy Gibbons (ZZ Top)Paul Kossoff (Free)Steve Jones (Sex Pistols/the Professionals)Peter FramptonNeal Schon (Journey)John Sykes (Whitesnake/Thin Lizzy/Tygers Of Pan Tang)Adrian Smith (Iron Maiden)

Many greats have played this instrument. It’s arguably the most famous brand and style electric guitar ever made. Just a few musicians that have played it are: Gary Moore, Jimmy Page, Eric Clapton. Slash is the current “face” of Les Paul for Gibson, and has his own Signature model. It’s a truly iconic brand.
